data.content:
noun
plural -tas
[noncount] :a reddish clay that is used for pottery and tiles
planters/jars made of terra-cotta
[count] :things (such as tiles, pottery, or statues) that are made from terra-cotta - often used before another noun
terra-cotta jars from ancient Greece
terra-cotta tiles
[noncount] :a brownish-orange color - see color picture
